get.description: This API searches for a particular setting/functionality configured in your Zoho Desk portal.
This API displays the main Setup page of your Zoho Desk portal.

parameters.description: Additional information related to the setting/functionality. Values allowed are: @subCategories@.

schema.description: Additional information related to the setting/functionality. Values allowed are: @subCategories@.

get.description: This API list the setting modules.
